main event: A mysterious aircraft was observed on the night of 7 August 1949 while traveling from Mexico City to Tampico, Tamps., Mexico.
interesting points: The object was described as being 120 ft long, quite narrow, and of a silo yellow color.
It had no lights like an aircraft, appeared to be flat on the bottom with a rounded nose, and was trailing a pinpoint of fire.
The object was estimated to be at an altitude of about 5,000 feet and was traveling at a speed of about 350 miles per hour.
The witness tried to locate any aircraft lights but none were visible, and the object appeared to be traveling on a straight course at a constant altitude.
The witness noted that the object's nose may have been generating its power, and despite the slow appearance of the object, it might have been at a greater distance than judged.
